net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

Class OFSwitchAppHandshakePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFSwitchAppHandshakePlugin

  • public abstract class OFSwitchAppHandshakePlugin
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a plugin that can be used by applications to tap into the switch handshake. It operates much like the switch handshake. Messages should be sent upon entering the plugin and OF response messages should be handled just like any part of the switch handshake.
    Author:
    Jason Parraga
